Enumeration.Name: DeviceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the device type.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the device type.

EnumEntry.Name: Transmitter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data stream transmitter device.
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream transmitter device.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data stream receiver device.
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream receiver device.

EnumEntry.Name: Transceiver
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data stream receiver and transmitter device.
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream receiver and transmitter device.

EnumEntry.Name: Peripheral

EnumEntry.Description: Controlable device (with no data stream handling).

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.Description: Device`s serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceUptime
Integer.ToolTip: Time of Device boot.
Integer.Description: Time of Device boot.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates max data in bits from the camera each second.
Integer.Description: Indicates max data in bits from the camera each second.

Integer.Name: DeviceConnectionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which Connection of the device to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which Connection of the device to control.

Integer.Name: DeviceConnectionSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission of the specified Connection.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission of the specified Connection

Enumeration.Name: DeviceConnectionStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.

EnumEntry.Name: Active
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Connection is in use.
EnumEntry.Description: Connection is in use.

EnumEntry.Name: Inactive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Connection is not in use.
EnumEntry.Description: Connection is not in use.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which Link of the device to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which Link of the device to control.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active. When disabled, lower level TL specific features are expected to control the throughput. When enabled, DeviceLinkThroughputLimit controls the overall throughput.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkConnectionCount
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the number of physical connection of the device used by a particular Link.
Integer.Description: Returns the number of physical connection of the device used by a particular Link.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Activate or deactivate the Link`s heartbeat.
Enumeration.Description: Activate or deactivate the Link`s heartbeat.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the Link heartbeat.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the Link heartbeat.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Link heartbeat.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Link heartbeat.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.
Integer.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.

Float.Name: DeviceCommandTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link.
Float.Description: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link. This corresponds to the maximum response time of the device for a command sent on that link.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Enumeration.Description: Reports the type of the stream channel.

Integer.Description: Index of device`s Link to use for streaming the specifed stream channel.

Integer.Description: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.

Enumeration.Name: RegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region of interest to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 2.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control all the regions at the same time.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control all the regions at the same time.

Enumeration.Name: RegionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the usage of the Region.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the usage of the Region.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the usage of the Region.

Enumeration.Name: RegionDestination
Enumeration.ToolTip: Control the destination of the selected region.
Enumeration.Description: Control the destination of the selected region.

EnumEntry.Name: Stream0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The destination of the region is the data stream 0.
EnumEntry.Description: The destination of the region is the data stream 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Stream1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The destination of the region is the data stream 1.
EnumEntry.Description: The destination of the region is the data stream 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Stream2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The destination of the region is the data stream 2.
EnumEntry.Description: The destination of the region is the data stream 2.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: ImageCompressionQuality
Integer.ToolTip: Control the quality of the produced compressed stream.
Integer.Description: Control the quality of the produced compressed stream.

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Group.Integer: Total number of bytes between 2 successive lines. Total number of bytes between 2 successive lines. This feature is used to facilitate alignment of image data. Line Pitch Expert LinePitch_Inq RW LinePitch_Reg B<-->

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied after the flip.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Boolean.Name: ReverseScanDirection
Boolean.ToolTip: select scan direction reverse or not.
Boolean.Description: select scan direction reverse or not.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCompressionMode

Enumeration.Description: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image compression is disabled. Images are transmitted uncompressed.
EnumEntry.Description: Image compression is disabled. Images are transmitted uncompressed.

EnumEntry.Name: JPEG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: JPEG compression is selected.
EnumEntry.Description: JPEG compression is selected.

Enumeration.ToolTip: Size of a pixel in bits.
Enumeration.Description: Size of a pixel in bits.

Enumeration.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the sensor`s test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the sensor`s test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 0 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 0 test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 1 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 1 test pattern generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Region2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: TestPattern feature will control the region 2 test pattern generator.
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the region 2 test pattern generator.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Black
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the darkest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: White
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the brightest possible image.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A moving horizontal line is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A moving horizontal line is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: VerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A moving vertical line is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A moving vertical line is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black, Red, Green, Blue, Cyan, Magenta and Yellow.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameCounter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: A frame counter is superimposed on the live image.
EnumEntry.Description: A frame counter is superimposed on the live image.

EnumEntry.Name: MonoBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with stripes of color including White, Black.

EnumEntry.Name: HorizontalColorBar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with Horizontal Color Bar.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with Horizontal Color Bar.

EnumEntry.Name: Checkboard

EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with Checkboard.

Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

Enumeration.Description: Select the Signal wait mode of the device.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Status of the selected acquisition signal.
Boolean.Description: Status of the selected acquisition signal.

Boolean.Name: FrameTimeoutEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the Frame Timeout.
Boolean.Description: Enables the Frame Timeout.

Integer.Name: FrameTimeoutTime
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the frame timeout in microseconds. When the timeout expires before a frame acquisition is complete, a partial frame will be delivered.
Integer.Description: Sets the frame timeout in microseconds. When the timeout expires before a frame acquisition is complete, a partial frame will be delivered.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.
Command.Description: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in multi-frame acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in multi-frame acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables manual control of the camera frame rate.
Boolean.Description: Enables manual control of the camera frame rate.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: ResultingFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed frame acquisition rate (in frames per second) given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth
Float.Description: Indicates the 'absolute' value of the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate. The 'absolute' value is a float value that indicates the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate in frames per second given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionLineRate
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate at which the Lines are captured.
Integer.Description: Controls the acquisition rate at which the Lines are captured.

Integer.Name: ResultingLineRate
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed Line acquisition rate (in Lines per second) given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth
Integer.Description: Indicates the 'absolute' value of the maximum allowed acquisition Line rate. The 'absolute' value is a float value that indicates the maximum allowed acquisition Line rate in Lines per second given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionLineRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables manual control of the camera Line rate.
Boolean.Description: Enables manual control of the camera Line rate.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that ends the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that controls the duration of the Acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that controls the duration of the Acquisition of one or many frames. The Acquisition is activated when the trigger signal becomes active and terminated when it goes back to the inactive state.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger ending the capture of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.

EnumEntry.Name: LineStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in line scan mode).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one Line of a Frame (mainly used in line scan mode).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the end of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the end of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of the exposure of one frame (or Line).

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls whether or not the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls whether or not the selected trigger is active.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger if Trigger Source is set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger if Trigger Source is set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Boolean.Name: TriggerCacheEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Cache is enabled.
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Cache is enabled.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when Exposure Mode is Timed.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure set to manual control.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure set to manual control.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure is automatically adjusted once, then returns to Off.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure is automatically adjusted once, then returns to Off.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure is automatically adjusted by the camera
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure is automatically adjusted by the camera

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Exposure time in us when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Float.Description: Exposure time in us when Exposure Mode is Timed.

Enumeration.Description: Sets the priority of the Exposure and Gain.

Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyDirection

EnumEntry.Description: The counter increments or decrements 1 for every full quadrature cycle with jitter filtering.

Integer.Name: EncoderCounter
Integer.ToolTip: This integer value (read only) indicates the current value of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Integer.Description: This integer value (read only) indicates the current value of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.

Command.Name: EncoderCounterReset
Command.ToolTip: This command resets the tick counter count of the shaft encoder module to 0.
Command.Description: This command resets the tick counter count of the shaft encoder module to 0.

Command.Name: EncoderReverseCounterReset
Command.ToolTip: This command resets the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module to 0 and informs the module that the current direction of conveyor movement is forward. Reset must be carried out before the first conveyor movement in the forward direction.
Command.Description: This command resets the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module to 0 and informs the module that the current direction of conveyor movement is forward. Reset must be carried out before the first conveyor movement in the forward direction.

Integer.Name: EncoderCounterMax
Integer.ToolTip: This integer value sets the maximum value for the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the maximum value for the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.

Integer.Name: EncoderMaxReverseCounter
Integer.ToolTip: This integer value sets the maximum value for the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module.
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the maximum value for the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module.

Integer.Name: UserSetCurrent
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the user set that is currently in use.
Integer.Description: Indicates the user set that is currently in use. At initialization time, the camera loads the most recently saved user set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the selected configuration into the camera's volatile memory and makes it the active configuration set. Once the selected set is loaded, the parameters in the selected set will control the camera.
Command.Description: This command loads the selected configuration set from the non-volatile memory in the camera to the volatile memory and makes the selected set the active configuration set. Once the selected set is loaded, the parameters in the selected set will control the camera.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves the current active configuration set into the selected user set.
Command.Description: This command copies the parameters in the current active configuration set into the selected user set in the camera's non-volatile memory.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the configuration set to load, save, or configure. Once a configuration set has been selected, all changes to the configuration set settings will be applied to the selected configuration set.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the configuration set to load, save or configure. Possible values for the User Set Selector are: Default: Selects a configuration set that contains factory settings. User Set 1: Selects the first user set. When the Default configuration set is selected and loaded using User Set Load, the device must be in default factory settings state and must make sure the mandatory continuous acquisition use case works directly. Default User Set is read-only and cannot be modified.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the default configuration set
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the default configuration set.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user set 1.

Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the configuration set to be used as the default startup set. The configuration set that has been selected as the default startup set will be loaded as the active set whenever the camera is powered on or reset.

IntReg.Name: TimestampTickFrequencyHiReg
